font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; fill: black;
text.tspan: - The ticker information which provides details of premiums/margins associated with the derivatives deals can be captured
- If Parameterised, automated Trade Authorisation will be enabled
- Possible to place FXOTC Orders by using Single Generic Master created for FXOTC Contracts
- Commission will be calculated at Order level based on Charge Tax Type for Dx.trade activity if set in
SC.CHARGE.TAX.CALC.CREATE else calculated based on DX.COMMISSION and defaulted to the order or can be a manual
- Possible to input automatic close out details to off-set an existing position and system would automatically close out the two.
- For option with underlying future, maturity date for underlying future can be defined
